refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the number of columns in the result set

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
PDOStatement
intcolumnCount
Use to return the number of columns in the result set represented by the PDOStatement object.
If the PDOStatement object was returned from , the column count is immediately available.
If the PDOStatement object was returned from , an accurate column count will not be available until you invoke .

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the number of columns in the result set represented by the PDOStatement object. If there is no result set, returns 0.
